Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Each Cell is a little square that form the Battlefield. Each one of them is uniquely identified by two int. A Cell always has an height is 0 if nobody has already build there and always has a boolean that tell us if there is a player on it.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Constructors

    Cell​(int x, int y)
    Create a cell with given coordinates

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean equals​(Cell targetCell)
    Check if a cell is equal to a targetCell Equal means that they have the same x and y coords

    boolean getIsDome()  
    int getPosX()  
    int getPosY()  
    boolean getThereIsPlayer()  
    void incrementHeight()
    Increment the height of a Cell by one The height start from zero and can be incremented up to 3 If a cell with an height of 3 is incremented it becomes a dome and become un-buildable
    void setFree()
    Used when a player move his token away from this cell

    Set the height of this cell
    void setIsDome()
    Make a Cell un-buildable.
    void setOccupied()
    Used when a player put a Token in this Cell

      public Cell​(int x, int y)
      Create a cell with given coordinates
      Parameters:

    • setOccupied

      public void setOccupied()
      Used when a player put a Token in this Cell

    • setFree

      public void setFree()
      Used when a player move his token away from this cell

    • setIsDome

      public void setIsDome()
      Make a Cell un-buildable. This happen when incrementHeight method is called on a Cell's that is height 3

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Cell targetCell)
      Check if a cell is equal to a targetCell Equal means that they have the same x and y coords
      Parameters:
      targetCell - the cell to check
      Returns:
      true if they have the same x and y coords

    • incrementHeight

      public void incrementHeight()
      Increment the height of a Cell by one The height start from zero and can be incremented up to 3 If a cell with an height of 3 is incremented it becomes a dome and become un-buildable
